page.title: 12Sports Facilities in Kirkby
page.content: Apart from the many things you can do at Kirkby Stadium there are several other forms of recreational activity in Kirkby. There is a public swimming pool which contains a baby pool, a big pool, a diving pool and a sauna. Another facility that Kirkby offers is a BMX course. You can also join many sports clubs. Ones that I know of are tap dancing, ju-jitsu, cubs, scouts, brownies and guides. I have joined a swimming club and I go to it on a Monday. In a survey that I did with my class we interviewed 99 people and asked whether they took part in any sport in Kirkby. Only 36 said that they did. We found out that the most popular sport was swimming and when the pool instructors were interviewed they said that over 2000 people use the large swimming pool each week.
